content.text:
# Rebellion (EP)

Rebellion is an EP by Swiss heavy metal band Samael. It was rated 1.5 stars by AllMusic.
Track listing
#"Rebellion" - 3:26
#"After the Sepulture (New Version)" - 3:31
#"I Love the Dead" (Alice Cooper cover) - 3:32
#"Static Journey" (instrumental) - 6:02
#"To Our Martyrs (New Version)" (cassette edition bonus track) - 2:37
#"Into the Pentagram (New Version)" - 4:24
#Unlisted hidden track - 13:46
The hidden track starts with an electronic instrumental outro, then after silence from 3:31 to 7:42 is a version of "Static Journey" with German vocals.
References
